languages.text: "А я понимаю ледышку. Тут все сквозит варпом — словно нарочно продырявили, как и в самой системе. Нет, без колдунства на планете не обошлось — понять бы только, откуда оно взялось".

traits.locale_text: "А я понимаю ледышку. Тут все сквозит варпом — словно нарочно продырявили. Нет, без колдунства на планете не обошлось — понять бы только, откуда оно взялось".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here reeks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."
languages.original_text: "А я понимаю ледышку. Тут все сквозит варпом — словно нарочно продырявили, как и в самой системе. Нет, без колдунства на планете не обошлось — понять бы только, откуда оно взялось".

traits.locale_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here wreaks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here wreaks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here wreaks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here reeks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我能明白这个冰人儿在想些什么。这里的一切都散发着亚空间的臭味，就连这个星系本身也一样，就像是被谁故意扎出了很多洞一样。不用想，这颗行星肯定是受到了巫术的影响，我们只要弄清楚它是从哪来的就行了。”
languages.original_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here reeks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."

traits.locale_text: “我能明白这个冷冰冰的家伙在想些什么。这里的一切都散发着亚空间的臭味，就连这个星系本身也一样，就像是被谁故意扎出了很多洞一样。不用想，这颗行星肯定是受到了巫术的影响，我们只要弄清楚它是从哪来的就行了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Sé lo que está pensando el hombre de hielo. Todo lo que hay aquí apesta a la disformidad, como si se hubiera agujereado la realidad intencionadamente, al igual que el resto del sistema. No cabe duda de que hay hechicería en este planeta; solo necesitamos averiguar de dónde procede».
languages.original_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here reeks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."

traits.locale_text: «Sé lo que está pensando el hombre de hielo. Todo lo que hay aquí apesta a la disformidad, como si se hubiera agujereado la realidad intencionadamente, al igual que el resto del sistema. No cabe duda de que hay hechicería en este planeta; solo necesitamos averiguar de dónde procede».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「アイスマンの考えは理解できるわ。ここにあるものはすべて、システムそのものと同じように、意図的に穴だらけにされたかのように歪みが生じているのだから。いいえ、この惑星では間違いなく魔術が働いているわ。あたしたちはただ、これがどこから来るのかを理解しなければならないってだけ」
languages.original_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here reeks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."

traits.locale_text: 「アイスマンの考えは理解できるわ。ここにあるものはすべて、システムそのものと同じように、意図的に穴だらけにされたかのように歪みが生じているのだから。いいえ、この惑星では間違いなく魔術が働いているわ。あたしたちはただ、これがどこから来るのかを理解しなければならないってだけ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je comprends le raisonnement de l'inquisiteur. Cet endroit est imprégné du Warp, comme s'il y avait été exposé à dessein, à l'image du système tout entier. Non, c'est bien de la sorcellerie qui est à l'œuvre sur cette planète ; il faut juste découvrir d'où elle émane. »
languages.original_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here reeks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends le raisonnement de l'inquisiteur. Cet endroit est imprégné du Warp, comme s'il y avait été exposé à dessein, à l'image du système tout entier. Non, c'est bien de la sorcellerie qui est à l'œuvre sur cette planète ; il faut juste découvrir d'où elle émane. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann den Gedanken des Eismanns verstehen. Alles hier stinkt nach dem Warp, als wäre er absichtlich durchlöchert worden, genau wie das System selbst. Nein, auf diesem Planeten ist ohne Frage Hexerei am Werk, wir müssen nur herausfinden, woher sie gekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here reeks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann die Gedanken des Eismanns nachvollziehen. Alles hier riecht nach dem Warp – als hätte jemand absichtlich viele Löcher hineingestochen, genau wie ins System selbst. Auf diesem Planeten ist definitiv Hexerei am Werk, wir müssen nur herausfinden, woher sie kommt."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Buz küpünün ne düşündüğünü anlayabiliyorum. Buradaki her şey, buram buram öteboyut kokuyor. Sanki sistemde olduğu gibi kasıtlı olarak delikler açılmış. Hayır, bu gezegende kesinlikle sahirlik söz konusu. Bizim de bunun kaynağını öğrenmemiz gerek."
languages.original_text: "I can understand the iceman's thinking. Everything here reeks of the warp — as if it has been pricked full of holes deliberately, just like the system itself. No, sorcery is definitely at work on this planet, we just need to figure out where it came from."

traits.locale_text: "Buz küpünün ne düşündüğünü anlayabiliyorum. Buradaki her şey buram buram öteboyut kokuyor. Sanki kasıtlı olarak delikler açılmış gibi. Tıpkı sistemin kendisi gibi. Hayır, bu gezegende kesinlikle sahirlik söz konusu ve bizim de bunun nereden geldiğini öğrenmemiz gerek."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
